entities.name: OUR MANUFACTURING
entities.description: The entity responsible for leading manufacturing processes and handling lead times, estimates of customers' future demand, and revising purchasing processes.

entities.name: OUR INVENTORY
entities.description: The entity dealing with inventory management, purchase commitments, and demand expectations for future quarters and long-term supply and capacity needs.

relationships.relationship_description: Our Manufacturing leads the manufacturing process which directly affects Our Inventory's management of supply and demand.
